block_comment: This block of code is responsible for signifying the completion of a data transfer process via an I2C transceiver. The code carries out this task by setting the 'transfer_complete' signal to binary 1 when the state of the I2C transceiver, denoted by 's_i2c_transceiver', matches the predefined constant 'I2C_STATE_6_COMPLETE', which indicates completion. If the states do not match, 'transfer_complete' is set to binary 0, indicating an incomplete transfer.
